answers.answer: I just finished packing mine yesterday and put it in the car lol 39 weeks today
I had mine packed weeks a go:-) i am also 39 weeks today.
Packed mine a couple weeks ago, 39 weeks 3 days today. And I just want my baby here already! I'm getting so impatient! Lol

Packed one for my baby right after our baby shower (29w). I couldn't resist filling that diaper bag with stuff!I  installed the carseat andpacked one for myself at 35w, because there was a chance I might go early (gestational diabetes)My hubby still hasn't packed his bag yet, but he'll be doing that tonight when he gets home from work. (I'm 37 weeks as of today, and I've had diarrhea and back cramps all day)
Me and you are 37 weeks! I had diarrhea all day!!
I have had mine packed since probably 30 weeks hahah! I'm going to be 38w on Saturday 9/12/15

Homebirthing as well, probably won't pack a bag! My sisters can pack one for me if I need to transfer and bring it so I don't think I'll bother :p38 weeks now, so really need to install the car seat at least!
I'm waiting to put car seat in, I don't see the point until baby is here, trying to get the other kids around a car seat for maybe up to 4 weeks  (when it's not needed) is just annoying. :)

question: So I'm 37 + 4, and after braxtons for the last 2 weeks and a lot of pressure I've decided to pack a hospital bag, even though I'm gearing for a home birth, (but the home birthing pack hasn't arrived yet, and I havent picked up any mess yet) it's the just In case baby decides to come a little early, or I have to go to hospital during. My partner has been on at me for weeks to get one packed haha. Any of you ladies (that haven't birthed yet) got yours packed?
title: Packed the bags.
